name: Cozmo
description: He’s a supercomputer and loyal sidekick all at once. Thanks to artificial intelligence, Cozmo can express hundreds of emotions.

reviews.body: The thing I’m most excited about now is playing with Cozmo’s SDK, which will hopefully allow me to unlock more of his potential and create abilities for him myself.
reviews.author: book_thief@me.com

reviews.body: Wow, this little guy is Amazing!
reviews.author: stevem@me.com

name: WowWee - MiP the Toy Robot - White
description: Perched atop unique dual wheels, this multi-functional and autonomous robot is more than just a toy.
